title: JESB (1.3); Special Issue, Presence of Chinese Businesses in the World
description:
En este episodio del canal de Journal of Evolutionary Studies in Business entrevistamos a los investigadores Félix Barahona Márquez (Escola Universitària Mediterrani) editor del Special Issue "Presence of Chinese Businesses in the World" y Lourdes Casanova (Cornell University).
 The presence of Chinese businesses in the world 

Felix Barahona Márquez

 PDF 

 Chinese companies conquering the world: A descriptive analysis of the rapid rise of Chinese acquisitions 

Lourdes S. Casanova, Anne Miroux

 PDF 

 Chinese investments in Latin America: An analysis of host country determinants 

Diego Quer, Laura Rienda, Rosario Andreu

 PDF 

 Chinese Companies and Foreign Direct Investment in Brazil between 2000 and 2018 

Armando João Dalla Costa, Li Yu Fang Yi, Adalto Acir Althaus Junior

 PDF 

 The Chinese Project “One Belt One Road” Toward Latin America and the Caribbean. Economic-financial implications 

Ruvislei González-Sáez

 PDF 

 The creation and transfer of entrepreneurship in emerging economies of the world. An approach through large family-owned corporations of China, Mexico and Brazil 

María Fernández-Moya, Paloma Fernández-Pérez

 PDF 

 Chinese Business in Latin America and the Caribbean: A Historical Overview 

Patricia Palma, María Montt Strabucchi

 PDF 


Presenta Paula De La Cruz-Fernandez, historiadora y editora bilingüe. Editora de New Books Network en español. Fundadora y editora, Edita.
